mapper.select: SELECT BL.BL_COLUMN_NAME as COLUMN_NAME, BD.BD_DATA, BD.BD_BL_KEYNO, BD.BD_BL_TYPE, BD.BD_KEYNO FROM T_BOARD_COLUMN BL, T_BOARD_COLUMN_DATA BD WHERE BL.BL_KEYNO = BD.BD_BL_KEYNO AND BD.BD_BN_KEYNO = #{BD_BN_KEYNO} ORDER BY BL.BL_COLUMN_LEVEL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BOARD_COLUMN_DATA( BD_KEYNO, BD_BT_KEYNO, BD_BN_KEYNO, BD_BL_KEYNO, BD_BL_TYPE, BD_MN_KEYNO, BD_DATA ) VALUES( #{BD_KEYNO}, #{BD_BT_KEYNO}, #{BD_BN_KEYNO}, #{BD_BL_KEYNO}, #{BD_BL_TYPE}, #{BD_MN_KEYNO}, #{BD_DATA} )

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BOARD_COLUMN_DATA_HISTORY ( BDH_BD_KEYNO, BDH_BD_BT_KEYNO, BDH_BD_BN_KEYNO, BDH_BD_BL_KEYNO, BDH_BD_BL_TYPE, BDH_BD_MN_KEYNO, BDH_BD_DATA, BDH_BNH_KEYNO ) SELECT BD_KEYNO, BD_BT_KEYNO, BD_BN_KEYNO, BD_BL_KEYNO, BD_BL_TYPE, BD_MN_KEYNO, BD_DATA, #{BDH_BNH_KEYNO} FROM T_BOARD_COLUMN_DATA WHERE BD_BN_KEYNO = #{BD_BN_KEYNO}
mapper.update: UPDATE T_BOARD_COLUMN_DATA A SET ( A.BD_KEYNO, A.BD_BT_KEYNO, A.BD_BN_KEYNO, A.BD_BL_KEYNO, A.BD_MN_KEYNO, A.BD_BL_TYPE, A.BD_DATA) = ( SELECT B.BDH_BD_KEYNO, B.BDH_BD_BT_KEYNO, B.BDH_BD_BN_KEYNO, B.BDH_BD_BL_KEYNO, B.BDH_BD_MN_KEYNO, B.BDH_BD_BL_TYPE, B.BDH_BD_DATA FROM T_BOARD_COLUMN_DATA_HISTORY B WHERE A.BD_KEYNO = B.BDH_BD_KEYNO AND BDH_BNH_KEYNO = #{BDH_BNH_KEYNO} ) WHERE A.BD_KEYNO IN ( SELECT BDH_BD_KEYNO FROM T_BOARD_COLUMN_DATA_HISTORY WHERE A.BD_KEYNO = BDH_BD_KEYNO AND BDH_BNH_KEYNO = #{BDH_BNH_KEYNO} )
